title: Geri Horner unrecognisable in hilarious Peaky Blinders Halloween costume
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Geri Horner (previously Geri Halliwell) just did a pretty spot-on homage to Peaky Blinders character Thomas Shelby, played by Cillian Murphy.

Ginger Spice took to Instagram today to post the uncanny costume she donned for Halloween with the caption: ‘Ready for Halloween? By order of the Peaky Blinders.’

In the video, Geri walked towards the camera while guiding her horse along with her.

Geri Horner is unrecognisable as Peaky Blinders character (Pictures: @therealgerihalliwell/Instagram)

She said in her best Birmingham accent: ‘Alright, it’s not about France or the garrison. We’re all in agreement for generations, killing a man affects the heart.’

‘We can change who we are, but we can’t change what we want. Get to work – cut him,’ she added.

Geri then looked towards some pumpkins and remarked: ‘No rest for you in this lifetime. Maybe the next.’

Geri Horner slays as Tommy Shelby from Peaky Blinders (Picture: @therealgerihalliwell/Instagram)

The Circle star Katie Roe Carr commented on the video: ‘Love it.’

While singer and actress Martine McCutcheon replied: ‘This is the best post ever… I’m crying! Sooo bloody good! X can I be Polly?!’

(Polly is Tommy’s aunt, in case you weren’t familiar.)

Reps for Cillian Murphy declined to comment on the Halloween costume. We’re just gonna hope he’s so flattered, he has no words…

The 47-year-old Spice Girl was a guest judge on the most recent episode of Drag Race UK.

Geri Horner awkwardly laughs at Posh Spice impression (Picture: BBC)

One of the contestants was going to do an impression of fellow Spice Girl, Posh (AKA Victoria Beckham), and Geri was not impressed at all.

‘You were going to do Posh? You would’ve been a brilliant Posh,’ Geri screamed.

Divina de Campo was less convinced, saying: ‘After you’ve pointed and pouted, where the f*** are you going?’

And while Ru found the drag queen’s comment hilarious, Geri looked decidedly awkward at the dig at her former bandmate.

Asked to give a sample of her VB impression, Divina let rip – convincing Essex accent and all. ‘Well I’d really like to join you on the reunion, Geri,’ she said, ‘but I can’t be a***d, I’m a brand now.’

Awkward.
